page.title: 11HOBBIES AND CLUBS
page.content: The Infant girls prefer drawing and reading while the Junior girls like collecting things and reading. The Infant boys like cycling and swimming and Junior boys enjoy football and sport. Secondary boys also put football first with computers a good second. Secondary girls prefer pop music, dancing and reading. Ladies main hobbies are knitting, sewing and reading while the men have sport as their main hobby. Few infants attend clubs of any kind but many of the Junior children belong to Cubs and Brownies. Secondary children belong to Guides and Scouts and many go to the Youth Club. There seems to be no pattern of club membership for men. Most don't belong to anything but a few go to very specialized clubs. Many of the women belong to women's organisations.
